cause.description:
Avaaz.org is a new multi-issue online network that provides opportunities for citizens of every country to take concerted action on urgent global problems--climate change, poverty, the crisis in the Middle East. Avaaz.org's mission is to ensure that the views and values of the world's people shape global decisions. It operates in 12 languages. Recently launched in January 2007, it now has more than one million members, including citizens from every nation of the world. 'Avaaz' means 'voice' in several European, Middle Eastern and Asian languages.
1. Global public opinion is the new superpower.
cause.mission: Ensure that the views and values of the world's people inform global decision-making.
cause.name: Avaaz.org
